title: Value of consumer credit outstanding in the U.S. 2000 to 2018
yAxis: Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2011 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars, about 3644.2 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Consumer credit in billion U.S. dollars, of value 2757.07 was reported at Year 2011
